subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby became the N.H.L.’s seventh-youngest player to reach the 600-point mark, with a goal and three assists to help the Pittsburgh Penguins beat Buffalo.
snippet: Sidney Crosby became the N.H.L.’s seventh-youngest player to reach the 600-point mark, with a goal and three assists to help the Pittsburgh Penguins beat Buffalo.
